Articles.Content:
i now have 80 hours into KSP and i have been completely hooked

science sandbox mode suits me fine. Want that new Part? do science!

one day i'll try career mode when i can stomach the bureaucracy.

the last 20 or so hours i have been using Mechjeb 2 and loving it.

i have to admit that MJ2 is better at setting up a closest approach to target then i am:rolleyes:

in regard to the .1% negative.....Well it seems that i have forgotten what that was?

Edited January 12, 2015 by albone20
I have over 80 weeks in KSP and have been completely hooked as well.
